animal.question: I say 'Meow,' and I like to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🐈 I like to nap in sunny spots.
🥛 I drink milk.
🧶 I play with yarn.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I love to play fetch! What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on bones.
🎾 I chase balls in the park.
🏡 I live in a doghouse or inside with my family.

animal.question: I quack and waddle. I love to swim in a pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I eat plants and seeds.
🦆 I have webbed feet.
💦 I like to splash in puddles.

animal.question: I say 'Moo,' and I give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat grass in the field.
⚫ I have black and white spots.
🥛 People drink the liquid I make.

animal.question: I hop and have long ears. I love to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I like to munch on orange vegetables.
🐇 I live in a burrow.
🏃 I am very quick and can jump far.

animal.question: I roar and I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane.
👑 I am a big cat.
🐾 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to eat from high places.
🦒 I have spots all over my body.
🌳 I am the tallest mammal on Earth.

animal.question: I have big ears and a trunk, and I live in Africa and Asia. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I use my long nose to drink water.
🌍 I am the biggest land animal.

animal.question: I swim in the ocean and have a big fin on my back. Some people think I am scary, but not all of us are! What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I live in saltwater.
🦈 I have sharp teeth.
🐟 I eat fish and other sea creatures.

animal.question: I’m a striped animal that looks like a horse. You can find me in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes are unique to each one of me.
🐎 I'm related to horses.
🌍 I roam the African grasslands.

bug.question: I have six legs and can fly, I like sweet flowers, what am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I buzz around pretty flowers
💛 I make something yummy
🍯 I love to make honey

bug.question: I am red with black spots, and I bring good luck, who am I?

hints.text: 🐞 Some people think I am lucky
⚫ I have dots on my back
🔴 My main color is a primary color

bug.question: I hop around in the grass, and I am green, what am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I blend in with the plants
🦗 I make a chirping sound
🦵 I can jump really far

bug.question: I make a silky home as a pupa and then fly away as something beautiful, what am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I start out as a worm-like creature
🏠 I live inside a cocoon/chrysalis
🦋 I change into something with colorful wings

bug.question: I work with my friends to carry things bigger than us, what am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am a very strong insect
🤝 I work in a colony
🕳️ You can find me near a hill of dirt

bug.question: I crawl on plants and eat leaves, then make a chrysalis, what am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I love to munch on green things
🌈 I can be many colors
🦋 I turn into a butterfly or moth

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my dinner, what am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is made of silk
🕷️ I have eight legs
🪰 I eat insects that get stuck

bug.question: I light up the night with my glow, what am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am bright in the dark
🌙 I'm active when it gets dark
💡 My light helps me find a friend

bug.question: I fly and have big eyes and shiny wings and love being near water, what am I?

hints.text: 💧 I like to hang around lakes and ponds
🦋 My wings are iridescent
👀 I have very good eyesight

bug.question: I jump very high, rub my legs together to make a sound, and like dry, grassy places, what am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I am know for the sound I make
🦗 I make a chirping noise.
🏜️ I like dry weather
